name: Welcome to Shrink Escape!
description:
A fast paced spaceship dodging game which includes a missile launcher that will shrink objects instead of destroying them, use this to your advantage to beat the Campaign Mode on either Normal or Hard difficulty! Or play on the Infinite Level mode to see how long you can survive and generate your own High Score.

Each level is rather unique to each other, with a total of 5 levels, 2 Difficulties and an Infinite Level.

Controls:

W = Up

S = Down

A = Left

D = Right

Spacebar = Missile Launcher (Shrinks Objects, 7 Second Cooldown)

You can also use the Arrow Keys for movement.

Escape (Esc) = Pause/Menu

Donate to paypal.me/AdamEarlston if you want to support the game developer!
